advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Introducing the new Flickr app for iPhone and iPad.
Access and organize your photos from anywhere.

+ Upload and access your photos from anywhere in their original quality
+ Backup all your photos on Flickr, not just your favorites, with 1000 GB of free storage
+ Snap photos using powerful live filters and edit using in-app tools such as: crop, straighten, rotate, adjust brightness, contrast, saturation, exposure, white balance, color balance, levels, sharpen
+ Quickly edit your image details and organize into albums
+ Share your photos and videos to Tumblr, Facebook, Twitter and more
+ Follow friends and discover a community with billions of photos

Tell us what you think
We are committed to building the best Flickr and are interested in your feedback.

Let us know your thoughts for iPhone here: https://yahoo.uservoice.com/forums/238245
And for iPad: https://yahoo.uservoice.com/forums/238246

Note: If you already have the Flickr app, you will be asked to sign in. For questions relating to sign-in, take a look at: http://yhoo.it/1mbfCO8
trackCensoredName: Flickr - Upload, edit, and share your photos
